messages.content:
Web VR A-Frame world with random sky, floor color, 100 random size rectangular buildings with color R between 127 and 200, G between 15 and 140, B between 10 and 30 , random black or yellow rectangle on sides of buildings. Random string updated once every second. 10 spheres with text labels update once every 10 seconds using color, position and text content information from random string. random string displays in white at top. display updated
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
